snippet.title: Patch 0.19.0 (16/02/24)
snippet.description:
0.19.0 - Hotfix & Buzzer Beater 

Features:
• New Buzzer Beater Mechanic

Quality of Life & UI/UX: 
• Removed Legacy players (Adriana, Ajay & Takashi)
• Added New Player Select Screen
• Removed the possibility to score points in Arena.

Bug Fixes:
• Fixed an issue where some of the players would get stuck at the beginning of the game
• Players who trigger offside will no longer become stuck.
• Fixed an issue where players would frequently remain in a running animation pose, making them look like floating when sprinting.
• Fixed an issue where scoring a goal without being assisted would display Assist (None).
• Fixed an issue where Settings would not get saved.

Known Issues:
• Rejoining issues. Avoid leaving & rejoining ongoing sessions. - Server crashes for all participants if the player supposed the play a free kick leaves the game.
• Player nametags are no longer available in this version.
• Ball sounds are corrupted.
• Sometimes when jockeying, the player will not face the ball.
• Players can enter restricted areas during kick-off or corners.
• In some rare situations, players might get in a state where taking possession of the ball is locked until the buttons for releasing the ball are pressed.
• The leaderboard is not updating.
• Shooting/Passing bar can remain visually cached.
• On rare occasions, the player may be stuck in a sprint state.
